comments.body:
@kwilcox please add `{% set commit = "613a82849d0dd43761e005606cd4c7ba3cd44188" %}` at the top and then change these to:

```yaml
  fn: {{ commit }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/LibraryOfCongress/bagit-python/archive/{{ commit }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d43091a9ce5915d667d4af5eb11345dadadda2d5b084fd2cfdeb2d03473a84fd
```

They are using `setuptools-scm` to version... which was new to me. It needs the actual git repo to run... unless we want to patch those portions out.

```
LookupError: setuptools-scm was unable to detect version for '/data/miniconda3/conda-bld/work/bagit-python-613a82849d0dd43761e005606cd4c7ba3cd44188'.

Make sure you're either building from a fully intact git repository or PyPI tarballs. Most other sources (such as GitHub's tarballs, a git checkout without the .git folder) don't contain the necessary metadata and will not work.
```
Argh. I saw that before. Do not make that change then.
